item1: Procter & Gamble Company (the Company) world-leading multinational consumer goods company focused providing trusted, branded products superior quality, performance value improve lives consumers around world - now generations come. products sold about 180 countries territories throughout world. Company incorporated Ohio 1905, having first been established New Jersey corporation 1890, built business founded Cincinnati 1837 William Procter James Gamble. Financial Information about Segments Information about reportable segments can found MD&A Note 2 Consolidated Financial Statements.
item7: Net sales increased $245 million $84.3 billion versus prior year. Net sales increased low single digits Health Care unchanged Grooming, Fabric & Home Care Baby, Feminine & Family Care. Net Sales declined low single digits Beauty. Organic sales, which exclude impact acquisitions divestitures foreign exchange, increased 2%.
